entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3 except zero over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 3 except zero over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
